FulfillmentStepDependencyDef.name: FulfillmentStepDependencyDef
FulfillmentStepDependencyDef.description: Represents a dependency that must be created between two fulfillment step records.

DependencyScope.description: The scope of the fulfillment step dependency definition. For example, Order or Order Item.

DependsOnStepDefinitionId.description: The fulfillment step definition that must be executed before this step.

FulfillmentStepDefinitionId.description: The identifier of the fulfillment step definition.

IsCompensateInReverse.description: Indicates whether the order to insert the compensated group steps is reversed when a fulfillment step is canceled (true) or not (false).

Name.description: The name of the fulfillment step dependency definition.

PropagateStateToDependentStep.description: The state thatâ€™s propagated to the dependent fulfillment step when the source fulfillment step is amended or canceled in the fulfillment plan.
